title: Samoa I Sisifo
creator_credit: Dan Tristam, Jamie Wilson and Juniper Films
brief_description: Portrays the interweaving of traditional values and progressive development of the Samoan islanders giving an overall coverage of the people and their lifestyle. Covers also the tourist industry and shows the celebration of Western Samoa’s 10th anniversary of independence.
creator_credit_for_label: Dan Tristam, Jamie Wilson and Juniper Films
